amendment.description: Amendment sought to set the loan interest rates at 5% per annum for the first 5 years and 9% per annum thereafter.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 116-178 to set the loan interest rates at 5% per annum for the first 5 years and 9% per annum thereafter.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roe, David P. amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 245 (Roll no. 503).

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Roe, David P.
